name: Bleep Bloop Power Bot
description:
Game was developed within a 48 hour window for the GMTK Game Jam 2021

You are a robot in a nuclear power plant. The doors above the cooling pond are stuck and have to get closed manually. Your mission is to get down to the pond and close the doors.

Note:
You can onlye drive forward if you have enough power. You can only get more power if you are joined together with a red socket

controls:

  • turn left: a
  • turn right: d
  • shoot left power plug: q
  • shoot right power plug: e
  • start drive: space
  • reset level: delete
